name: Mazurka - A Ghost in Italy
description:
Mazurka - A Ghost in Italy is a 5 minute-long autobiographical interactive poem-thingy about dancing and depression in the Italian night.

Also: colors.

So many colors.

Just, colors.

99% of this game's development was troubleshooting colors.
